name: sls_app_etl_at_error_monitor
displayName: 数据加工异常报错监控

queryList.query: (__topic__:  __etl-log-status__ and "logging.levelname": ERROR) | select "__tag__:__schedule_id__" as job_id, arbitrary("__tag__:__job_name__") as job_name, arbitrary("etl_context.logstore") as logstore, count(*) as cnt, array_agg(distinct etl_context) as etl_context, array_agg(distinct reason) as reason from log where regexp_like("__tag__:__schedule_id__", '.*') group by job_id limit 10000

annotations.value: 过去5分钟内，源logstore ${logstore}下的数据加工作业(作业ID:${job_id}, 作业名称:${job_name})产生了${cnt}条报错日志，etl_context: ${etl_context}, reason: ${reason}。更多报错细节请前往加工日志库internal-etl-log查看。
数据加工异常报错监控
